Serialized Form

  • Package MapObjects

    • Class MapObjects.Animal extends Interactable implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • curDir

          Direction curDir
          Current Direction of the Animal

        • speed

          int speed
          Speed of the Animal

        • health

          int health
          Health of the Animal

    • Class MapObjects.Interactable extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • xLocation

          int xLocation
          The x-location of the object

        • yLocation

          int yLocation
          The y-location of the object

        • width

          int width
          The width of the object

        • height

          int height
          The height of the object

        • relativeCollisionBox

          java.awt.Rectangle relativeCollisionBox
          The collision box used by the object. Definition is relative to the 0,0 position of the object.

    • Class MapObjects.Litter extends Interactable implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • imgID

          int imgID
          Number generated randomly that later maps to A SpriteID to paint it with.

        • lType

          LitterType lType
          Enum from LitterType that represents the type of Litter this object is

          ReceptacleType rType

    • Class MapObjects.River extends Interactable implements Serializable

  • Package MVC

    • Class MVC.Model extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • player

          Player player
          The only controllable object in the game.
          See Also:
          Player

        • gamePhase

          GamePhase gamePhase
          The current game phase

        • tutorialState

          TutorialState tutorialState
          Current state of the tutorial

        • hasLitter

          boolean hasLitter
          Whether the Player is carrying Litter.

        • spacePressed

          boolean spacePressed
          Whether the space key is currently pressed down.

        • crabDirection

          int crabDirection
          The current movement direction of the Model.crab.

        • plantDamage

          int plantDamage
          The amount of health to detract from the Plant every time it is damaged

        • tBin

          Receptacle tBin
          The trash bin

        • rBin

          Receptacle rBin
          The recycle bin

        • trashVictory

          boolean trashVictory
          Whether the trash bin recently received a piece of Litter

        • recycleVictory

          boolean recycleVictory
          Whether the recycle bin recently received a piece of Litter

        • trashGlow

          int trashGlow
          A count of the number of frames the trash bin has been in glowing victory state for

        • recycleGlow

          int recycleGlow
          A count of the number of frames the recycle bin has been in glowing victory state for

        • crab

          Animal crab
          The Crab, currently the only Animal in the game.

        • animals

          java.util.HashSet<E> animals
          Every animal in the world. Currently only the crab.

        • litterSet

          java.util.HashSet<E> litterSet
          HashSet of all of the current Litter objects in the game

        • litterAttrSet

          java.util.HashSet<E> litterAttrSet
          HashSet where every element is an ArrayList containing the x and y coordinates of the Litter objects, as well as the imgID and LitterType to send to View

        • animalXIncr

          int animalXIncr
          The horizontal speed of the Crab

        • animalYIncr

          int animalYIncr
          The vertical speed of the Crab

        • playerMove

          boolean playerMove
          Whether the player is allowed to move this frame. Set to false under specific circumstances, i.e. when colliding with an Animal

        • pickedUp

          Litter pickedUp
          The last Litter to be picked up by the Model.player

        • pickedUpAttr

          java.util.ArrayList<E> pickedUpAttr
          ArrayList of Litter imgID and LitterType of Model.pickedUp Litter attribute to send to View

        • animalEatenLitter

          Litter animalEatenLitter
          The last Litter to be picked up by an animal

        • plants

          java.util.ArrayList<E> plants
          Contains plant objects

        • randPlant

          int randPlant
          Random index of next plant

        • tutorialPlantGrown

          boolean tutorialPlantGrown
          Boolean variable that represents whether the player has planted the plant that despawns in the tutorial

        • tutorialAnimalAteLitter

          boolean tutorialAnimalAteLitter
          Boolean variable that represents whether the animal has eaten the Litter in the tutorial

        • tutorialArrowKeyPrompt

          boolean tutorialArrowKeyPrompt
          Boolean that represents whether the arrow key prompt should be shown on screen.

        • tutorialHoverLitter

          boolean tutorialHoverLitter
          Boolean that represents whether or not the Player is hovering, but not picking up a Litter object

        • river

          River river
          onscreen river

        • running

          boolean running
          Boolean value to represent if the game is in progress or over

        • startTime

          long startTime
          The time in milliseconds that the game has begun

        • endTimeMilli

          int endTimeMilli
          How many milliseconds the game should last

    • Class MVC.View extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • frame

          javax.swing.JFrame frame
          The JFrame housing this View.

        • pickedUpAttr

          java.util.ArrayList<E> pickedUpAttr
          The image attributes of the Litter object most recently held by the Player

        • hasLitter

          boolean hasLitter
          Whether the player is holding on to litter

        • litterAttrSet

          java.util.HashSet<E> litterAttrSet
          Contains all Litter objects to be rendered onscreen, maps them to a Sprite.ID.

        • plants

          java.util.ArrayList<E> plants
          Contains all plant objects onscreen

        • litterSet

          java.util.HashSet<E> litterSet
          contains all of the Litter objects on-screen

        • tutorialState

          TutorialState tutorialState
          Gamestate variable that represents the current stage of the tutorial the player is at

        • tGlow

          boolean tGlow
          A Boolean to decide if the trash bin is in the glowing deposit state

        • rGlow

          boolean rGlow
          A Boolean to decide if the recycling bin is in the glowing deposit state

        • playerHealth

          int playerHealth

        • animalHealth

          int animalHealth

        • river

          River river
          river onmap

        • startTime

          long startTime
          A long representing when the game started in order to draw the truck timer in the correct spot

        • endTime

          int endTime
          A long representing when the game should end in order to draw the truck timer in the correct spot

        • arrowKeyPrompt

          boolean arrowKeyPrompt
          Boolean that determines whether the arrow key prompt should be shown on screen.

        • hoverLitter

          boolean hoverLitter
          Boolean that represents whether or not the Player is hovering, but not picking up a Litter object

        • fontWorldToPt

          java.util.Map<K,V> fontWorldToPt
          Stores font sizes calculated using binary search. Should be reset whenever View is resized.

        • gamePhase

          GamePhase gamePhase
          The current phase of the game

        • endScreenTimestamp

          long endScreenTimestamp
          The time that the phase GamePhase.GAME_END was entered. -1 when not in GAME_END.

  • Package Player

    • Class Player.Player extends Interactable implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • dx

          int dx
          Horizontal movement direction. -1 for moving left, 0 for horizontally stable (initial value), 1 for moving right.

        • dy

          int dy
          Vertical movement direction. -1 for moving up, 0 for vertically stable (initial value), 1 for moving down.

        • SPEED

          int SPEED
          Movement speed

        • direction

          Direction direction
          Movement direction. Gets recalculated when Player.dx and Player.dy are changed to match their behaviour. Initial value is EAST.

        • status

          PlayerStatus status
          Player status, i.e. IDLE or WALKING, etc. Gets recalculated when Player.dx and Player.dy are changed to match their behaviour. Initial value is IDLE.

        • health

          int health
          Player's health
